Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Twenty ( 56 % ) acetaminophen - induced ALF patients had a formal psychiatric diagnosis before LT ( non - acetaminophen - induced ALF = 0 / 35 , CLD = 2 / 34 ; P < 0 . 01 for all ) and nine ( 25 % ) had a previous suicide attempt .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |

| Non-acetaminophen-induced ALF (Non-acetaminophen-induced Acute Liver Failure) |
| CLD (Chronic Liver Disease) |
| Psychiatric diagnosis |
| Suicide attempt |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acetaminophen-induced Acute Liver Failure (ALF) |
| Chronic Liver Disease (CLD) |
| Psychiatric diagnosis |
| Suicide attempt |

Note: Acetaminophen-induced ALF and Non-acetaminophen-induced ALF are both types of Acute Liver Failure. Therefore, it is sufficient to list "Acute Liver Failure" once and specify the types in the description.
